title: Shadow Prince Malazhar passive bug
body: When the spell shield passive is off cooldown, shadow prince Malz is replaced with the default skin. When the passive pops his skin goes back to shadow prince. Slightly unfortunate as his passive is up about 60-70% of the time you barely get to see the skin.

replies.body: O__O Yikes, looks like the overlay is busted. I just logged a bug for it, and I'm in the process of pushing it along to the team. Thanks for the report! <3
Sweet, I can play shadow-bug malzahar in this aram starting now!
